snippet.title: Tower Song - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
#game #indiegame  #jrpg #turnbasedstrategy 

Tower Song is now available on Steam Early Access:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2336330/Tower_Song/

Tower Song is a 2D turn-based retro-fusion JRPG! Engaging combat and character-driven drama await players and their chosen hero in this strategy mechanics-rich role playing adventure. (Don't forget to pet the cat!)

Subscribe to our newsletter: https://oigames.substack.com/

Chat with us on Discord: https://discord.gg/jV4yjGKEQG
